(temporal) conditional

𓇋𓏲 𓇋𓈖 when one … exclamation and question particle, rarely:

𓈖 vn ⋍ when one “von” ⇔ donde 𓏏 𓈖 𓏮 𓌙 𓅯 𓈐 whence ? where ?

𓇋𓏲 𓇋𓈖 ⇔ even if when one ever

𓈖 wenn man (if) [Hittite man] 𓂋

𒉕 gen / gan / 𒃶/𒃷? 𒂷 ga 𒂵 given ᵍwhen

𐌾𐌰𐌱𐌰𐌹 given > 𐌹𐌱𐌰𐌹 > when / even if

𐌹𐌱𐌰𐌹 > إِنْ when (if) > لونـ lawenn- “if (hypothetical)” > لو law “if (hypothetical)” (lets assume)
